top_comments.comment: Maybe John could do a review of the classic Xbox game BLACK. i think it has one of the most realistic firearms

comments_since_last_sample.body: I hope the next episode is COD Vanguard with the disgusting weapon customization so we can see Johnathan get truly upset.
I want to see jonathan do a weapon from zombie army 4 dead war.

If you haven't checked out Medal of honor, Doorfi.. ehm i mean. Warfighter then i would like to see you check out the weapons in that game and how the animations are! If you have already checked it out then please tell me! xD
I would like to see his reaction to the Army of 2 guns.
